page.title: 09HOUSING _ RURAL WILTSHIRE
page.content: UPPER UPHAM _ consists of 1 farmhouse; 1 renovated coach house; Eyres Barn, which is converted into a house; The Old Manor House (divided into 2 units); the Manor Lodge; and Highclere House. There are also 6 modern detached houses, built during the 1960's to recreate a feudal village round a green. There are also 3 smaller modern houses. LOWER UPHAM _ consists of 1 old farmhouse and two pairs of fairly modern semi_detached houses. LIDDINGTON WARREN _ One 17th century farm house across the road from 3 detached modern farmworkers' houses. Surprisingly there are no old cottages in this area. At present there are no plans for further housing development in this area.
